org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.transaction.sql
Class AeSQLTransaction

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.transaction.sql.AeSQLTransaction
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAeSQLTransaction, IAeTransaction
public class AeSQLTransaction
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAeSQLTransaction

Implements a transaction over a JDBC connection. The begin() sets the transaction as active and the first call to the getConnection method opens a JDBC connection and sets the connection's autocommit setting to false, so that database activities on the connection will occur in a single database transaction. Additionally the getConnection() method returns a proxy for this connection that ignores attempts to close the connection. Ultimately, either commit() or rollback() are called to commit or rollback the database transaction and close the database connection.

Field Summary
private  boolean mActive
          True if begin has been called and no commit or rollback.
private  java.sql.Connection mBaseConnection
          Base JDBC connection for the active transaction.
private  java.sql.Connection mProxyConnection
          Proxy JDBC connection for the active transaction.
